[SYNTAX]: Overly complex sentence structures (e.g., "As the glovemaker looked out...")
[GRAMMAR]: Minor inconsistencies in tense (e.g., "was born" to "grew up")
[PUNCTUATION]: Excessive use of commas in descriptive passages

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transition from biographical narrative to historical events
[CLARITY]: Overly dense historical context may confuse without prior knowledge
[TRANSITION]: Lack of clear connection between Grasse descriptions and Parisian art world
[LOGIC]: Temporal jumps (e.g., from 1732 to historical events without clear year connections)

[SYNTAX]: Occasionally complex sentence structures may impede immediate clarity.
[LEXICON]: Some archaic vocabulary (e.g., "diligence", "kinsman") might require additional context for modern readers.

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transition from Fragonard's artistic development to the political event of Damiens stabbing the king.
[CLARITY]: The purpose of mentioning the Director-General's replacement and its impact on Fragonard is not clearly connected.
